molarMass.title: Calculadora de masa molar
molarMass.subtitle: Calcula la masa molar de compuestos químicos
molarMass.description: Herramienta para calcular la masa molar de compuestos químicos ingresando su fórmula molecular

errors.emptyFormula: Por favor, ingrese una fórmula química

results.molarMass: La masa molar de "{formula}" es: {mass} g/mol

common.chooseTool: Elige una herramienta en la barra lateral para comenzar.
common.description: Esta aplicación está diseñada para ayudar a estudiantes y profesores con cálculos químicos, visualización de datos y organización de contenidos.

banner.title: Consentimiento de Cookies
banner.message: Este sitio utiliza cookies para mejorar su experiencia. Usamos Google Analytics y Microsoft Clarity para análisis de uso. Puede aceptar o rechazar cookies no esenciales.

preferences.title: Preferencias de Cookies
preferences.essentialDescription: Necesarias para el funcionamiento básico del sitio
preferences.analyticsDescription: Ayudan a entender cómo usa el sitio (Google Analytics, Microsoft Clarity)

introduction.paragraph1: Mol Class está comprometido en proteger su privacidad y datos personales. Esta Política de Privacidad explica cómo recopilamos, usamos y protegemos su información cuando utiliza nuestro sitio web y servicios educativos de química.
introduction.paragraph2: Esta política cumple con el Reglamento General de Protección de Datos (GDPR) y otras regulaciones aplicables de protección de datos.

automaticDataList: Dirección IP e información del dispositivo
Tipo de navegador y sistema operativo
Páginas visitadas y tiempo de permanencia
dataCollection.notCollectedText: Mol Class no recopila datos sensibles (como información de salud, orientación religiosa, política o sexual), ni datos personales directamente identificables, como nombre, correo electrónico o número de identificación.

list: Proporcionar y mejorar nuestros servicios educativos
Analizar el uso del sitio para mejoras
Garantizar la seguridad y funcionamiento adecuado
dataUsage.explanation: [ES] Data is used exclusively for educational and service improvement purposes.
dataUsage.explanationItems: [ES] Educational experience personalization,Service improvement and optimization,Communication about relevant updates,Legal obligation compliance

cookies.management: Puede gestionar las cookies a través de la configuración de su navegador. Tenga en cuenta que deshabilitar ciertas cookies puede afectar la funcionalidad del sitio.
cookies.essentialList: [ES] Language and theme preferences,Cookie consent preferences,Session management and security,Basic site functionality and navigation
cookies.analyticsList: [ES] Google Analytics: Traffic analysis and user behavior tracking,Microsoft Clarity: User experience analysis and session recordings,Performance monitoring and error tracking
cookies.intro: [ES] We use cookies to improve your browsing experience and analyze our traffic.
cookies.items: [ES] Essential cookies for basic functionality,Analytics cookies for usage analysis (optional),Preference cookies for personalization

thirdParty.intro: Utilizamos los siguientes servicios de terceros:
thirdParty.googleAnalyticsList: [ES] Website traffic and user behavior analysis,Anonymized and aggregated usage statistics,Data retention: 26 months maximum,Privacy Policy: https://policies.google.com/privacy
thirdParty.microsoftClarityList: [ES] User experience analysis and interaction tracking,Anonymized session recordings and heatmaps,Performance optimization insights,Privacy Policy: https://privacy.microsoft.com/privacystatement

rights.intro: Según las regulaciones de protección de datos, usted tiene derecho a:
list: Solicitar la eliminación de sus datos
Presentar una queja ante las autoridades de protección de datos
rights.introItems: [ES] Access and rectification of your data,Deletion and portability rights,Objection and restriction options,Consent withdrawal at any time
rights.access: [ES] Access: Know what personal data we hold about you
rights.correction: [ES] Rectification: Request correction of inaccurate data
rights.deletion: [ES] Erasure: Request deletion of your personal data
rights.objection: [ES] Object: Oppose certain types of data processing
rights.restriction: [ES] Restrict: Limit how we process your data

contact.intro: Para ejercer sus derechos o hacer preguntas sobre esta política, contáctenos:
contact.response: Responderemos a su solicitud dentro de 30 días.
contact.subject: [ES] Subject: "Privacy Rights Request" or "Privacy Policy Inquiry"
contact.dataProtectionOfficer: [ES] For EU residents, you may also contact your local data protection authority if you have concerns about our data handling practices.

content.intro: [ES] This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when accessing our website and educational chemistry services.
content.introItems: [ES] Data collection and legal basis,Usage and retention policies,Your rights and how to exercise them,Cookie management and third-party services

cookieManagement.intro: [ES] We provide comprehensive cookie management options.

banner.intro: [ES] Our consent banner allows you to:
banner.list: [ES] Accept or decline cookies,Access detailed privacy policy and terms of use information

howTo.label: [ES] How to manage cookies:
howTo.steps: [ES] Use our consent banner,Adjust browser settings,Contact us for assistance

externalLinks.intro: [ES] Our website may contain links to external sites not operated by us.
externalLinks.details: [ES] We are not responsible for the privacy practices of external websites. We encourage you to review their privacy policies.

externalServices.intro: [ES] We use trusted third-party services to enhance our educational platform.
externalServices.details: [ES] These services follow their own privacy policies and adequate protection measures. Data may be processed outside your country.

security.intro: [ES] We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data:
security.items: [ES] Encryption of data in transit and at rest,Access controls and authentication systems,Regular security assessments and updates,Staff training on data protection practices,Incident response procedures

changes.intro: [ES] We may update this Policy to reflect legal, technological, or service changes.
changes.items: [ES] The last update date will always be indicated at the top,Important changes will be communicated through the website or email (when available),Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of the changes,We recommend reviewing this policy periodically

metadata.description: [ES] Comprehensive information on how we collect, use, and protect your data, cookies, and third-party services in compliance with international privacy regulations.

intro.title: [ES] Introduction
intro.content: [ES] Welcome to Mol Class. These Terms of Use govern your access to and use of our educational platform.

content.description: [ES] Mol Class is a digital educational platform that offers advanced technological tools for chemistry teaching and learning, including interactive, computational, artificial intelligence, and other educational technology resources.
content.featuresTitle: [ES] Available Features (including but not limited to):
content.features: [ES] Chemical and physical calculators, simulators, and computational tools,Molecular visualizers and interactive modeling systems,Interactive periodic table and chemical databases,Catalog of compounds, substances, and reference materials,Games, activities, and gamified learning resources,Artificial intelligence tools and educational support systems,Chemical data analysis, processing, and interpretation tools,Communication and interaction features for learning,Other educational tools and resources related to chemistry
content.evolutionText: [ES] The platform's features, functionalities, and technologies may be updated, expanded, modified, or discontinued at any time, always aiming to improve the quality and effectiveness of the educational experience offered to users.

content.disclaimer: [ES] While we strive to provide accurate and up-to-date information, we do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of any information in the service.
content.important: [ES] Always verify critical calculations with additional sources,Use results as educational reference,Consult scientific literature for professional applications,We are not responsible for decisions based on our calculations

content.lgpd: [ES] We comply with the General Data Protection Law (GDPR) and other applicable privacy regulations.
content.collection: [ES] We collect only data necessary for educational service operation.
content.purposes: [ES] Educational experience personalization,Service improvement,Communication about relevant updates,Legal obligation compliance
content.sharing: [ES] We do not share personal data with third parties for commercial purposes.
content.rights: [ES] You have the right to access, correct, delete, or port your data according to GDPR.

inappropriate.title: [ES] Inappropriate Content
inappropriate.text: [ES] We reserve the right to remove, without prior notice, any content that violates these Terms or is considered inappropriate.

reporting.title: [ES] Reporting Procedure
reporting.text: [ES] To report inappropriate content or violations:
reporting.steps: [ES] Send email to molclassapp@gmail.com,Subject: "Report - [Brief description]",Include content link/location and reason for report,Response time: up to 5 business days

suspension.title: [ES] Account Suspension
suspension.text: [ES] Users who repeatedly violate these Terms may have their accounts suspended temporarily or permanently.

entirety.title: [ES] Entirety
entirety.text: [ES] These Terms, together with the Privacy Policy, constitute the entire agreement between the parties.

independence.title: [ES] Clause Independence
independence.text: [ES] The invalidity of any clause will not affect the validity of other provisions.

assignment.title: [ES] Assignment
assignment.text: [ES] These Terms cannot be assigned by the user without express consent. Mol Class may assign its rights with prior notification.

validity.title: [ES] Validity
validity.text: [ES] These Terms remain valid while you use our services.

content.usage: [ES] We may use cookies and similar technologies to improve user experience and analyze platform usage.
content.control: [ES] You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings.

content.integration: [ES] Our platform may integrate with third-party educational tools and services.
content.responsibility: [ES] We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of third-party services.

content.disclaimer: [ES] Our platform may contain links to external websites for educational reference.
content.liability: [ES] We are not responsible for the content or practices of external websites.

content.availability: [ES] We strive to maintain service availability but cannot guarantee uninterrupted access.
content.accuracy: [ES] While we aim for accuracy, users should verify critical information independently.

content.law: [ES] These terms are governed by applicable consumer protection and privacy laws.
content.disputes: [ES] Disputes will be resolved according to the user's jurisdiction as provided by consumer protection legislation.

content.lastUpdate: [ES] Last Update: {date}. By continuing to use Mol Class after this date, you agree to these updated terms.

content.agreement: [ES] By accessing and using Mol Class, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you should not use our service.
content.scope: [ES] These terms apply to all visitors, users, and other people who access or use the service.

content.agreement: [ES] You agree to use Mol Class only for educational and legal purposes.
content.permitted: [ES] Use tools for educational studies and research,Share links to specific resources,Use calculation results for academic purposes
content.prohibited: [ES] Use the service for illegal or harmful activities,Attempt to hack, overload, or damage the system,Reproduce, duplicate, or copy the service without authorization,Use bots or automated scripts without permission

content.rights: [ES] The platform as a whole (collective work),Compilation, selection, and organization of content,Specific functionalities and features developed,Mol Class brand, name, and visual identity
content.sources: [ES] Public domain scientific information,Data from scientific and educational literature,Content created with the aid of artificial intelligence tools,Adaptations and inspirations from various educational sources,Third-party resources properly used
content.commitment: [ES] We respect third-party copyrights,We use only permitted or public domain content,When possible, we credit the sources used,We do not claim ownership over fundamental scientific information
content.userContentText: [ES] Calculation results, projects, and work created by users using our platform remain their property.
content.fairUseText: [ES] We recognize that educational use may involve citations, adaptations, and references to existing materials, always respecting fair use and educational principles.

content.disclaimer: [ES] Mol Class is offered "as is" and "as available", without express or implied warranties of continuous operation, content accuracy, or fitness for specific purposes.
content.exclusionsText: [ES] To the maximum extent permitted by law, we are not responsible for:
content.exclusions: [ES] Interruptions, technical failures, temporary or permanent platform unavailability,Direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential losses arising from tool use,Academic, professional, or personal decisions made based on presented content,Accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of provided information,Use of results in critical or commercial applications without independent validation,Violation of third-party intellectual property rights
content.userResponsibilities: [ES] Verifying information accuracy before use,Complying with their institution's academic standards,Not using the platform for illicit purposes
content.paidServicesText: [ES] Any future paid services will have their own specific terms, prevailing over these general terms in case of conflict in paid functionalities.
content.exceptionsText: [ES] This limitation does not exclude responsibilities in cases of fraud, bad faith, gross negligence, or when prohibited by mandatory law, including Consumer Protection Code.

content.right: [ES] We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time.
content.notification: [ES] Changes will be indicated by updating the 'last updated' date.
content.acceptance: [ES] Continued use after modifications constitutes acceptance of new terms.

content.disputes: [ES] We try to resolve issues amicably,Legal matters are resolved according to applicable jurisdiction,We respect consumer protection and privacy legislation,Competent forum: user's jurisdiction (according to consumer protection laws)

content.educational: [ES] This platform is designed exclusively for educational purposes in chemistry and related sciences.
content.responsibility: [ES] Users are responsible for using the tools appropriately and verifying results when necessary.

content.evolution: [ES] Our platform continuously evolves to better serve educational needs.
content.notification: [ES] Significant changes to core functionality will be communicated to users when possible.

footer.agreement: [ES] By continuing to browse, you agree to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

visualization.title: Visor de moléculas
visualization.subtitle: Explora moléculas interactivamente
visualization.description: Ingresa fórmulas químicas, visualiza estructuras 2D y 3D y explora diferentes representaciones moleculares.
visualization.placeholder: Buscar por nombre, fórmula, SMILES o CID...

controls.tooltip: Clic y arrastre para mover; Desplazar para hacer zoom; Shift + desplazar para mover; Doble clic para restablecer

home.description: Este es el punto de inicio de Mol Class, donde puedes acceder a diversas herramientas interactivas de química.

periodicTable.description: Explora todos los elementos químicos con datos completos y filtros interactivos.

tableHeaderDescriptions.id: [ES] Unique identifier number of the compound
tableHeaderDescriptions.name: [ES] Name of the chemical compound
tableHeaderDescriptions.commonName: [ES] Common or alternative name of the compound
tableHeaderDescriptions.molarMass: [ES] Molar mass in grams per mole (g/mol)
tableHeaderDescriptions.density: [ES] Density in grams per cubic centimeter (g/cm³)
tableHeaderDescriptions.solubilityNumeric: [ES] Maximum amount dissolved in 100g of water (g/100g H₂O)

catalog.title: Compuestos inorgánicos
